data.name: Ys IX: Monstrum Nox - Bonus Costumes and Items
data.detailed_description: Includes: Doll's "Erdlingen Gothic" Costume, Raging Bull's "Holstein Ranch" Costume, Item Set: "Monstrum Box A", Item Set: "Monstrum Box B", White Cat's "Eternian Blue" Costume, Crimson King's "Ecliptic Errant" Costume
data.about_the_game: Includes: Doll's "Erdlingen Gothic" Costume, Raging Bull's "Holstein Ranch" Costume, Item Set: "Monstrum Box A", Item Set: "Monstrum Box B", White Cat's "Eternian Blue" Costume, Crimson King's "Ecliptic Errant" Costume

English*, French, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
